document.full_text: farmer abdelbagi abdallah says his tiny plot of land in sudan's agricultural heartland bore him a bumper sorghum crop year after year, until pests and patchy irrigation ravaged his harvest.
document.title: anger simmers in sudan's farming heartland
lines_and_colors: farmer abdelbagi abdallah says his tiny plot of land in sudan's agricultural heartland bore him a bumper sorghum crop year after year, until pests and patchy irrigation ravaged his harvest.
